item.title: And of His signs is your sleep by night….
item.description:
بِسْمِ اللَّـهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ This is the continuation of the series, that focuses on implementing sunnah in our lives. In the last post, we talked about the etiquette of eating. In this post, we will look at the Sunnahs of going to sleep Click here to show evidences/reference links
What to recite before going to sleep: Recite Surah Al-Ikhlas, Surah Al-Falaq and Surah An-Nas and wipe the body.
